example.name: autogen1
example.text: In an extraordinary mix of cultures and church-state powers , Rep. Robert Dornan -LRB- R. , Calif . -RRB- lectured his fellow Roman Catholics -- including Mr. Florio -- for having the `` chutzpah '' to disagree with the hierarchy of their church on abortion .
example.arg: his fellow Roman Catholics -- including Mr. Florio -- ---> *-1
to disagree with the hierarchy of their church on abortion
